amendment.description: Amendment increases funding to the Edward Byrne Memorial Justice Assistance Grant program by $50 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) to the Edward Byrne Memorial Justice Assistance Grant program by $50 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kennedy (MN) amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 291 - 129 (Roll no. 330).
